version_description: Escape to the countryside and see what it truly means to live a beautiful life.
Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer.

Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer. We recently fixed some instances where rewarded video ads were not giving carrots and adjusted the share reward to function more fluidly. Plus some iPad optimizations.

We've updated the balance to help users unlock activities more quickly. On the first day, the big carrot now resets after 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 30 minutes, 1 hour and finally, 2 hours. Items in Yori's Store now reset every 2 hours instead of every day. So every time you come back to collect carrots there will be something new and exciting for you to check out and buy! (^_^)

We've updated the balance to help users unlock activities more quickly. On the first day, the big carrot now resets after 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 30 minutes, 1 hour and finally, 2 hours. Items in Yori's Store now reset every 2 hours instead of every day. So every time you come back to collect carrots there will be something new and exciting for you to check out and buy! (^_^)
Minor bug fixes.
Cloud save is here! Now you and Tsuki can rest easy. Your game progress a.k.a. 'Tsuki's existence' will be protected on the interwebs.

Are you experiencing the longest train ride of your life?! We fixed it!!! Now you should be able to move reliably on the train back and forth from Mushroom Village to the Great City without getting stuck (^_^) And cloud save is here! Now you and Tsuki can rest easy. Your game progress a.k.a. 'Tsuki's existence' will be protected on the interwebs.
Minor bug fixes.
Having issues with Cloud Save? We've fixed it! =( *.* )=
Added new SFX and made optimizations and localization improvements.

Optimizations and localization improvements.
Bug Fixes.

Travel with Tsuki to the snowy mountain town of Yukiyama. Here you'll meet 3 new friends in six different areas. Have fun riding the slopes in a brand new snowboarding mini-game. There are 34 new diary entries to unlock. Make sure to check in at Pakku's Shop for 13 new items to activate different activities. So many amazing things to explore. We hope you join Tsuki on this incredible adventure to Yukiyama!

Travel with Tsuki to the snowy mountain town of Yukiyama. Here you'll meet 3 new friends in six different areas. Have fun riding the slopes in a brand new snowboarding mini-game. There are 34 new diary entries to unlock. Make sure to check in at Pakku's Shop for 13 new items to activate different activities. So many amazing things to explore. We hope you join Tsuki on this incredible adventure to Yukiyama!

It's Chinese New Year (农历新年) and we have a special update! Unlock a brand new area in the Mushroom Village where you can buy Chinese New Year themed foods and decorations (年货) to celebrate the Spring Festival (春节). Receive red envelopes (红包) from all your oldest friends. Unlock spectacular events like a fireworks (放鞭炮) show and a special dance (舞龙). From Tsuki to the world... 新年快乐！

Celebrate the Mooncake festival with Tsuki. Embark on a midautumn love story, and it all starts in Yukiyama.
The event ends on October 15th, so get everything while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

Meng the orangutan has arrived with a collection of snacks from his little island home. Head over to the event square to check them out!

The event ends on September 15th, so get everything while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

It's Chinese New Year (农历新年) and we have a special update! Unlock a brand new area in the Mushroom Village where you can buy Chinese New Year themed foods and decorations (年货) to celebrate the Spring Festival (春节). Receive red envelopes (红包) from all your oldest friends. Unlock spectacular events like a fireworks (放鞭炮) show and a special dance (舞龙). From Tsuki to the world... 新年快乐！

Dawn, the folksy beaver, is moving into town to help you spruce up Tsuki's village! All that garbage you've been collecting while fishing can now be recycled for nifty upgrades. Change the wallpaper and other decor or even add a 3rd story to Tsuki's humble house!

Dawn, the folksy beaver, is moving into town to help you spruce up Tsuki's village! All that garbage you've been collecting while fishing can now be recycled for nifty upgrades. Change the wallpaper and other decor or even add a 3rd story to Tsuki's humble house!

Easter is here and we have a special update! Nugget the Chicken has arrived with Easter themed foods and decorations to celebrate the Easter Day. Embark on an Easter Egg hunt! Will you be able to find all the eggs?

This Easter Event ends in June, get all the eggs while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries for this Easter Event.

This Easter Event ends in June, get all the eggs while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries for this Easter Event.

Club Moon has landed in Tsuki Adventure! Travel the world in a luxurious blimp, meet new characters and play all the minigames! There is a Club Moon in every location for you to visit!

It's Midsummer! Taiyaki, smoothies and ice cream are available for purchase in the event square! Watch the dancers perform while you enjoy your summertime snacks! The event ends on July 15th, so get everything while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

NEW LOCATION! Take a drive with Tsuki to experience the Jugafuchi Forest! Take a hike and trek deep into Jugafuchi or go fishing at a waterfall! There are also more friends for Tsuki to meet, diary entries to unlock and unique items to buy from Kuma's mobile supply shop! Get the update now and join Tsuki on a new adventure!

Celebrate the Mooncake festival with Tsuki. Embark on a midautumn love story, and it all starts in Yukiyama.
The event ends on October 15th, so get everything while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

The event ends on October 15th, so get everything while you can. Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

Spooky scary skeletons will send shivers down your spine because it's Halloween time! Spook-tacular treats, sweets and candy galore await you in the event square! Don't forget to look for Antonio for some Día de Muertos tidbits! It's going to be a boo-tiful October~
The event ends on November 30th, so all you candy collectors should grab everything you can! Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer.
Special deals coming your way for Buen Fin, Thanksgiving & Black Friday! Anniversary update coming soon!!!
Special deals coming your way for Buen Fin, Thanksgiving & Black Friday! Anniversary update coming soon!!!

They say time flies when you're having fun and guess what! Tsuki Adventure is finally a year old!

Mushroom Village will be receiving it's long awaited expansion with new areas and new diary entries!

Winter is coming and 'tis the season to be jolly because Christmas is here!

Celebrate this festive end of the year with the spirit of giving! Go on a quest to help Santa deliver missing presents! There will be NO diary entries associated with this event

Winter is coming and 'tis the season to be jolly because Christmas is here!

Celebrate this festive end of the year with the spirit of giving! Go on a quest to help Santa deliver missing presents! There will be NO diary entries associated with this event

Usher in the Lunar New Year with a bang! Celebrate the Year of the Rat with your friends with a stunning fireworks display in the Mushroom Village Event Square! Not forgetting the Lunar New Yeat treats and goodies!
The event ends on 15th February so grab as many Red Packets as you can! Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.

Usher in the Lunar New Year with a bang! Celebrate the Year of the Rat with your friends with a stunning fireworks display in the Mushroom Village Event Square! Not forgetting the Lunar New Year treats and goodies!
The event ends on 15th February so grab as many Red Packets as you can! Also, there are NO diary entries associated with the celebration.
Minor updates and bug fixes. Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer.

Reduce, Reuse, and Recycle! It's Earth Day and we've all got to do our part to keep Mother Earth clean and healthy! Head on down to the Event Square to meet Dande and help her out!

The event ends on 9th May and there are NO diary entries associated with this event.

Are you feeling tired, lonely and in urgent need of a break? Well get ready to leave it all behind and embark on a speedy boat ride to Resort Island Hareshima! Let your troubles melt away as you admire the wonderful seaside, while basking in the wonderful Hareshima sun! Maybe you'll even get a tan!

This update comes with new friends, new areas and new diary entries! Speak to Rilo or Soy at the pier for more details!

Are you feeling tired, lonely and in urgent need of a break? Well get ready to leave it all behind and embark on a speedy boat ride to Resort Island Hareshima! Let your troubles melt away as you admire the wonderful seaside, while basking in the wonderful Hareshima sun! Maybe you'll even get a tan!

This update comes with new friends, new areas and new diary entries! Speak to Rilo or Soy at the pier for more details!

It's the Midsummer festival! What better way to cool off than an ice cream taiyaki and a nice cold smoothie? Celebrate and admire the lantern display and carrot cart in the event square!

The event ends on 15th July so grab ALL the taiyakis you can! There's also a wallpaper! There are NO diary entries associated with this event.

Wow! It's August already? You know what that means! Meng and his friends are back once more! This time, they even have a special lightshow planned! Gather around in the event square at night for a spectacle to behold!

The event ends on 15th September so make sure to try all the local delights Meng has! There are NO diary entries associated with this event.

It's Mid-Autumn and Howie's back! Don't worry, Kagooya's with him this time, so head on over to Yukiyama to see what he has in store! Or bask in the moonlight with Pipi in the event square!

The event ends on 15th October so grab all the mooncakes you can! There are NO diary entries associated with this event.

Trick or treat yourself with Halloween goodies for it's October again! Make sure to check out the event square because Rinnie is back with new goodies and treats! Bone Appetit!

The event ends on 15th November so get your spook on! There are NO diary entries associated with this event.

Have you been a good bunny? Because it's Christmas and Nikolai is back! Visit all your friends and embrace the spirit of gift giving~ It's going to be a very Merry Christmas!

Celebrate this festive end of the year with the spirit of giving! Go on a quest to help Santa deliver missing presents! There will be NO diary entries associated with this event.

It's the Lunar New Year yet again! Have your fortune divined right here in Mushroom Village! It's going to be an a-moo-zing Year of the Cow filled with new treats and goodies!

The event ends on 28th Feb so grab all the Red Packets you can! Also there are NO diary entries associated with this event.

Keep your surroundings clean by going green! It's Earth Day again and Dawn has been working hard on something new! Head to the Event Square to find out what she's been up to!

The event ends on 20th May and there are NO diary entries associated with this event.
